title: Stylish Summer Outfits That Make Getting Dressed Easy
excerpt: Take a page from Bella Hadid, Kendall Jenner, and more.
text: Don’t look now, but summer is here, which means the time has come to showcase your hot-weather style with some fresh ’fits. Whether you plan to hit the beach with your crew or stay in with the A/C blasting, there’s no reason you can’t do it wearing something cute. If inspiration is lacking, you’re in luck, I found the best casual summer outfit ideas out there, inspired by major celebrities like Bella Hadid and Kendall Jenner and street style mavens alike. Stick to basics with an airy sundress and summer sandals or perhaps—if you’re feeling newly inspired by the NBA playoffs—opt for something sporty like a summer tracksuit and heels. At the end of the day, a cute outfit can make all the difference (at least, that’s what I believe!). Check out the stylish summer outfits you can all season long, below. Cropped T-shirt + Straight-Leg Jeans + Loafers Getty ImagesWhen in doubt, you can never go wrong with a pair of jeans and a baby tee. Take notes from Kendall Jenner, who accessorized this classic combo with loafers and a baseball cap for an effortlessly cool and casual look you can wear on repeat.Aritzia HomeStretch™ Rib Crew Waist T-ShirtMadewell The Vintage Flare JeanG.H.BASS Whitney Leather Loafer'47 New York Yankees Baseball CapDenim Jacket + Jean Shorts + SneakersGetty ImagesJean shorts and summer just go together, and what better time to wear your favorites? Throw on your trusty Adidas Sambas, like Hailey Bieber, and your go-to denim jacket for when the temps start to dip, and you’re set.Everlane The Ranch JacketBuck Mason Pima Boxy CrewAGOLDE Parker Long Loose Vintage ShortsAdidas Samba OG Graphic Tank Top + Cutoff Shorts + Cowboy BootsGetty ImagesTake a page from Bella Hadid and tap into the Western trend. Center your outfit around a pair of chic cowboy boots, and then style them with a fun graphic tee and cutoff shorts. You’ll have a trend-worthy outfit ready in no time. Aritzia BestHug™ Little Ribbed Icon T-ShirtFRAME The Hang ShortsTecovas The AnnieUlla Johnson Adria Pleated Wave Snakeskin-Embossed Bucket Bag Oversized Sweatshirt + Easy Tank + SweatpantsGetty ImagesDon’t feel obligated to dress up if you’re planning to lay low this summer. Sometimes, a sweatshirt and comfy sweatpants are the move. A monochromatic look like this one from Jennifer Lopez still looks put-together and elevated, even when you’re in a loungewear set. I anticipate no regrets. A romantic dress and ballet flats paired with a dainty necklace come together for an ensemble fit for a daytime outing. A lightweight tracksuit is just what’s in order. html:
Don’t look now, but summer is here, which means the time has come to showcase your hot-weather style with some fresh ’fits. Whether you plan to hit the beach with your crew or stay in with the A/C blasting, there’s no reason you can’t do it wearing something cute. If inspiration is lacking, you’re in luck, I found the best casual summer outfit ideas out there, inspired by major celebrities like Bella Hadid and Kendall Jenner and street style mavens alike.

Stick to basics with an airy sundress and summer sandals or perhaps—if you’re feeling newly inspired by the NBA playoffs—opt for something sporty like a summer tracksuit and heels. At the end of the day, a cute outfit can make all the difference (at least, that’s what I believe!). Check out the stylish summer outfits you can all season long, below.

Cropped T-shirt + Straight-Leg Jeans + Loafers

When in doubt, you can never go wrong with a pair of jeans and a baby tee. Take notes from Kendall Jenner, who accessorized this classic combo with loafers and a baseball cap for an effortlessly cool and casual look you can wear on repeat.

Aritzia HomeStretch™ Rib Crew Waist T-Shirt

Madewell The Vintage Flare Jean

G.H.BASS Whitney Leather Loafer

'47 New York Yankees Baseball Cap

Denim Jacket + Jean Shorts + Sneakers

Jean shorts and summer just go together, and what better time to wear your favorites? Throw on your trusty Adidas Sambas, like Hailey Bieber, and your go-to denim jacket for when the temps start to dip, and you’re set.

Everlane The Ranch Jacket

Buck Mason Pima Boxy Crew

AGOLDE Parker Long Loose Vintage Shorts

Adidas Samba OG

Graphic Tank Top + Cutoff Shorts + Cowboy Boots

Take a page from Bella Hadid and tap into the Western trend. Center your outfit around a pair of chic cowboy boots, and then style them with a fun graphic tee and cutoff shorts. You’ll have a trend-worthy outfit ready in no time.

Aritzia BestHug™ Little Ribbed Icon T-Shirt

FRAME The Hang Shorts

Tecovas The Annie

Ulla Johnson Adria Pleated Wave Snakeskin-Embossed Bucket Bag

Oversized Sweatshirt + Easy Tank + Sweatpants

Don’t feel obligated to dress up if you’re planning to lay low this summer. Sometimes, a sweatshirt and comfy sweatpants are the move. A monochromatic look like this one from Jennifer Lopez still looks put-together and elevated, even when you’re in a loungewear set. I anticipate no regrets.

Theory Terry Bouclé Hoodie

Buck Mason Heirloom Rib Scoop Tank

Now 47% Off

Gap VintageSoft Baggy Wide-Leg Sweatpants

Nike Dunk Low

Now 13% Off

Black Dress + Ballet Flats + Sunglasses

An all-black ensemble is perfect for any occasion, including a barbecue or picnic. A romantic dress and ballet flats paired with a dainty necklace come together for an ensemble fit for a daytime outing.

Doen Quinn Dress

Monica Vinader Siren Muse Station Chain Necklace

Dolce Vita Relan Flats

KULE The Etna Tote

Coordinated Tracksuit + Aviators + Metallic Sandals

Feeling like a woman on the move? A lightweight tracksuit is just what’s in order. And if you want to give it a fashion-girl twist, style it with this season’s trending aviator sunglasses and a pair of metallic sandals.

Halfdays Joyner Windbreaker Anorak

Halfdays Rosalie Trail Shorts

LOEWE Ibiza Mask Sunglasses

Now 45% Off

Margaux Positano Sandal

Sporty Shirt + Bubble Skirt + Metallic Accessories

Sports jerseys are trending for summer—and if you’re looking for an unexpected way to style yours, consider a cute bubble skirt. Spice things up with metallic accessories, and I guarantee you’ll be primed for a post on the grid.

Puma AC Milan 24/25 Replica Home

Mango Mini Balloon Skirt

Larroude Gaia Wedge Sandal

Bottega Veneta Sardine Intrecciato Leather Top-Handle Bag

Classic Cardigan + Denim Cutoffs

For something that feels casual but still elevated, consider a fitted cardigan paired with Bermuda shorts. Polished details like ballet flats and a leather designer bag will take things up a level.

Nili Lotan March Crewneck Cashmere Cardigan

Abercrombie Mid Rise Bermuda Short

Aeyde Delfina Leather Bow Ballerina Flats

Coach Brooklyn 39 Grain Leather Shoulder Bag

Easy Midi Dress + Strappy Heels

Nothing beats the heat quite like a sundress, which makes it a great option for your summer uniform. It’s easy, effortless, and chic—not to mention versatile. Wear it to dinner alfresco or for your neighborhood barbecue. This is a staple that can be as dressed up or down as you want it.

Hill House Home The Cosima Nap Dress

Veronica Beard Caterina Leather Sandals

STAUD Ollie Chain-Link Leather Shoulder Bag

CELINE EYEWEAR Triomphe Oval-Frame Acetate Sunglasses

Denim Jacket + T-shirt + Black Skirt

No doubt, a long black skirt is the most underrated MVP of your everyday wardrobe. For a go-to look, you can wear again and again, opt for a denim jacket, a classic white T-shirt, and easy flats (like the ones shown here, in the ever-popular butter yellow hue). It’s a classy and casual look that’ll work for nearly any summer occasion.

Madewell Button-Front Denim Jacket

Theory Tiny Tee

Vince Satin Slip Midi Skirt

Sam Edelman Michaela Mary Jane Flat

Now 85% Off
